str gpt_researcher.scraper.pymupdf.pymupdf.PyMuPDFScraper.scrape ( self)
The `scrape` function uses PyMuPDFLoader to load a document from a given link and returns it as a string.
Returns: The `scrape` method is returning a string representation of the `doc` object, which is loaded using PyMuPDFLoader from the provided link.
